H0.text: What is the surname of the US astronaut after whom the Thunderbirds character John Tracy is named. Carpenter

H1.text: What is the surname of the US astronaut after whom the Thunderbirds character John Tracy is named. Cooper

H2.text: What is the surname of the US astronaut after whom the Thunderbirds character John Tracy is named. Shepard

H3.text: What is the surname of the US astronaut after whom the Thunderbirds character John Tracy is named. GLENN

A4.text: John Herschel Glenn Jr. was an American Marine Corps aviator, astronaut, businessman, and politician.

A5.text: He was the third American in space and the first to orbit the Earth, circling it three times in 1962.
